sentence.Network_en: We should produce the littoral advantage well.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们应该把海滨的优势很好地发挥出来。

sentence.Network_en: The reservoir sandstone was believed to have been deposited in a littoral environment.
sentence.Network_cn: 储集层砂岩就被认为是近海环境的沉积.

sentence.Network_en: Climate suitability of seawater crabs culture in Jiangsu littoral was studied.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究江苏沿海海水蟹类养殖的气候适宜性.

list.abs: 英语百科词汇- 沪江碎碎图文集 ... monsoon climate 季风气候； littoral climate 海岸气候； sub-tropical climate 亚热带气候；.
...底(benthic division):包括海岸(seashore)和海底(sea-bottom).(1)滨海带(littoral zone):或称海岸带,包括潮间带和高潮时浪花可以溅到的岸线.(2)浅海带(sublittoral zone):海岸带下缘到大陆架边缘的大陆架海底.(1)和(2).
石油词汇英语翻译(L)--石油百科 ... little 小的；少 littoral area 滨海区 littoral benthal 浅海底的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin littoralis, from litus, litor- 'shore'

entry.def: In geography, the littoral means the coast.

example.ex: ...the countries of the north African littoral.
...the littoral countries of the Persian Gulf.

means.word_mean: 1. the region of the shore of a lake or sea or ocean
1. of or relating to a coastal or shore region

auth_sentence.content: One that a littoral reading misses......Even Jesus spoke in parables.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: One that a littoral reading misses......Even Jesus spoke in parables.

auth_sentence.content: If Justinian expected to extend to the north African littoral a Roman peace he was soon disabused.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: If Justinian expected to extend to the north African littoral a Roman peace he was soon disabused.

auth_sentence.content: Caught in the westbound littoral drift, the shrimp went to Texas, where much of the business is now.
